PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
names strings should be all lowercase. Use case goes like this: ${modID}:Trick

If Fatal, upgrade all Crest of Fire cards permanently. Crest of Fire cards can be upgraded any number of times. NL NL After upgrading more than 7 times, take 1 damage per upgrade. For example, Fire Tackle+10 will hurt you for 3 damage.
Target deals damage reduced by the cost of the highest card in your hand.
At the end of combat, you may choose between keeping Assist or the new generated card.

If you haven't played any cards, gain 5(6) Block. NL If you have played 1 card, gain 7(8) Block. NL If you have played 2 cards, gain 10(12) Block AND deal 6(8) damage. NL If you have played 2+ cards, gain 3(4) Block.
If this card is at the very left of your hand, activate the extra effect.
If this card is at the very right of your hand, activate the extra effect.

If you haven't played any cards this combat, add 1 Ring to your hand. NL If your last card played was an attack, your Rings will give you 1 Strength. NL If your last card played was a skill, your Rings will give you 1 Dexterity. NL If your last card played was a Power, your Rings will give you 1 Temporary Focus.
While this is in your hand, increase Block gained from cards by 1.
You should not see this message.
